title: How do I synchronize my B1 data to the Huawei TalkBand app?
answer:
Before you start, ensure the following:

1. Your B1 is properly connected to your phone over Bluetooth.

2. Your phone has been installed with the latest Huawei TalkBand app that runs properly.

3. Your phone and your B1 both have sufficient power.

After you run the Huawei TalkBand app, it will automatically synchronize data with your B1.

If you want to manually synchronize the data, go back to the home screen of the app, swipe down the screen from any point of the screen, and synchronize the data will be synchronized.
